name: microwave_start
description: This function is used to start the microwave with a specified duration.

parameters.name: location
parameters.description: The location where the microwave is located.

parameters.name: room
parameters.description: The room where the microwave is located.

parameters.name: device
parameters.description: The name of the microwave that needs to be started.

parameters.name: timer
parameters.description: The duration for which the microwave should cook.

parameters.name: compartment
parameters.description: The predefined compartment of the microwave that needs to be started.

parameters.name: temperature
parameters.description: The temperature at which the microwave should cook.

parameters.name: temperatureUnit
parameters.description: The unit of temperature for the SmartThings device.
